::Fractyl::

Fractyl listens to the bot, going from a surprised look to a frown.

"Look, you!" he growls, "I've just been slagged by a slagging base, I am not interested in kicking your butt right now, I just wanna get to a slagging CR chamber! By the pit, why in the Matrix would you think I'm a threat?! Do I LOOK like a threat?!!" Fractyl yells, waving his one functional arm. He was starting to lose it.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robin Kirkman <robin@d...> wrote:
> ::VorbIss::
> 
> "My name is VorbIss. I'm new around here, and I'm not liking it. Frankly, I 
> don't trust you. I don't know who you are, where you came from, or why you're 
> there. I just made a call to potential allies, and I think you're a potential 
> kidnapper."
> 
> VorbIss trained his taser on Fractyl's left eye. "I may not be powerfull, but 
> I've got enough juice in me to wipe you out. Understood? No sudden moves."
> 
> With that, VorbIss visibly relaxed somewhat. "Now that I'm done ensuring my 
> safety, I believe you were introducing yourself?"
